name: Out of Control (mostlymadproductions)
description:
This game is made for the GMTK game jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control

How the theme was used: The main enemy, the mask is out of control with its power and you must stop it.

--Controls--

Arrow Keys / W A S D == Move

R == restart

Esc == Exit
